thread.title: Donald Trump Tweets Displeasure At Photo CNN Used Of Him On Book Cover
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Tweets Displeasure At Photo CNN Used Of Him On Book Cover

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Donald Trump Tweets Displeasure At Photo CNN Used Of Him On Book Cover
text:
Donald Trump Tweets Displeasure At Photo CNN Used Of Him On Book Cover Share Share Tweet 
President-elect Donald Trump is none too happy about a picture CNN chose to use on the cover of the new edition of their book "Unprecedented." In a tweet sent on Monday, Trump expressed his hope that the book sells well, but said that he was not pleased with the picture of him chosen for the cover. @CNN just released a book called "Unprecedented" which explores the 2016 race & victory. Hope it does well but used worst cover photo of me! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 2, 2017 
Naturally, people were not exactly thrilled with the president-elect's reaction. This is apparently the photo the Mirror-Gazer in Chief hates. Make sure not to retweet it! @realDonaldTrump pic.twitter.com/qR8NtQSSDM
